thread.title: Trump Blasts Report of Russians Having Dirt on Him as “Fake News”
thread.title_full: Trump Blasts Report of Russians Having Dirt on Him as “Fake News”

author: Wilmot Proviso
title: Trump Blasts Report of Russians Having Dirt on Him as “Fake News”
text:
WikiLeaks Threatens to Sue CNN over Story Calling Assange a Pedophile 
It was reported that this had to do with a series of unverified documents allegedly put together by a former British intelligence officer. Those documents couldn’t be verified by any major media outlet, The U.K. Guardian reported. 
However, that didn’t stop listicle kings BuzzFeed News from publishing the unredacted documents on Tuesday, “so that Americans can make up their own minds about allegations about the president-elect that have circulated at the highest levels of the U.S. government.” 
Keep in mind that BuzzFeed also admitted that the documents were “unverified and potentially unverifiable” and also contained glaring errors. And the documents also weren’t just minor things, either. I absolutely refuse to reprint the accusations made against Trump in the documents, except to say that they go beyond disgusting. Advertisement - story continues below 
It didn’t take long for Trump to fire back at the reports: FAKE NEWS – A TOTAL POLITICAL WITCH HUNT! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 11, 2017 
It’s worth pointing out that for a news outlet that talked so much about “fake news” during the aftermath of Trump’s election, CNN seems entirely willing to air it themselves. It’s all part of a delegitimization process that the liberal media have applying to Trump all along. 
If the media want to start making these proclamations, they need to do it on more than flimsy evidence from error-riddled documents. Please like and share on Facebook and Twitter if you agree. Advertisement - story continues below
